definition: to check/to examine/to inspect/to exercise restraint
surname Suo/abbr. for 索馬里|索马里[Suo3 ma3 li3], Somalia
to search/to demand/to ask/to exact/large rope/isolated

sentences.english: Specify download quota for automatic retrievals.
sentences.chinese: 指定下載配額爲自動檢索。

sentences.english: Each read from the descriptor retrieves an outgoing packet which was routed to the interface.
sentences.chinese: 逐行讀取說明符將可以檢索到通向接口的出站數據包。

sentences.english: Please enter the designated numbers and then click Enter.
sentences.chinese: 輸入欲檢索的釋文條號，按確定鍵進行檢索。

sentences.english: Please enter the designated numbers and then click Enter.
sentences.chinese: 輸入欲檢索的釋文條號，按確定鍵進行檢索。

sentences.english: Using this invariability, the geometrical distortion is first retrieved.
sentences.chinese: 使用這種不變性，首先檢索的幾何失真。

sentences.english: All papers accepted will be indexed by ISTP.
sentences.chinese: 所有錄用論文將被ISTP檢索。

sentences.english: The user is then asked whether those guesses are good for each search.
sentences.chinese: 然後用戶會被詢問這些猜測是否有助於每次檢索。

sentences.english: We proposed the retrieval methods and the search strategy for network information resources on evidence-based nursing.
sentences.chinese: 提出了循證護理網絡信息資源的檢索方法與檢索策略。

sentences.english: We proposed the retrieval methods and the search strategy for network information resources on evidence-based nursing.
sentences.chinese: 提出了循證護理網絡信息資源的檢索方法與檢索策略。

sentences.english: Automatically retrieve and process the execution results of data rules
sentences.chinese: 自動檢索和處理數據規則結果。

sentences.english: Then you can quickly retrieve items from your pasteboard to reuse.
sentences.chinese: 然後，你就可以迅速檢索項目從您的紙板重用。

sentences.english: The efficiency of searching is the key problem of an E-journal Website.
sentences.chinese: 檢索效率是關係到電子期刊網站生死存亡的一處問題。

sentences.english: Master the literature search and other accesses to get technology information.
sentences.chinese: 熟練掌握文獻檢索和其它獲取科技信息的方法。

sentences.english: They often retrieved some data from a disk.
sentences.chinese: 他們常常從存儲磁盤中檢索一些信息。

sentences.english: Photo time-stamp is a valuable information source for photo retrieval.
sentences.chinese: 照片的時間戳是可用於照片檢索的重要信息。

sentences.english: This is down from 42% in 2007, primarily because there has been a corresponding increase in the number of charities automating their searches.
sentences.chinese: 主要原因是大部分的被調查機構在自動檢索上的增長。

definition: reference book (such as dictionary, almanac, gazetteer etc)
to contrast/to compare/to place side by side for comparison (as parallel texts)/to check
dictionary/also written 詞典|词典[ci2 dian3]/CL:本[ben3],部[bu4]
variant character/loan word/variant written form (for the same word)/different edition
to study attentively (a book)/to delve into
